attributes.action: Anti-2nd Referendum - (EU Referendum Rules triggering a 2nd EU Referendum.)
attributes.additional_details:
This happened to Ireland in 2009 when the establishment did not like from 2008 it was put up for a revote under different conditions

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Twenty-eighth_Amendment_of_the_Constitution_Bill_2008_(Ireland)
attributes.background: The British Public have made a choice and were given ample time to do so, Brexit won fair and squarely. This country is now free from the shackles of the EU. To ensure it stays that way. Vote against the anti-thesis of this petition by signing.
